Decentralized Agency increases our capacity to act by distributing one's agency between those we trust: formalizing feedback loops and social support.


As a collective, we use this framework to work on tangible as well as speculative projects that are less about being commercially viable and more about shaping viable futures.

The Why Paper Use Framework Project Aspirations
  • Substack ↗
  • Discord ↗
  • Colophon
